about.title: About Us
about.description: The intensity of our daily life often brings us some discomfort. Stress, lack of energy, tension, anxiety, pain can affect our balance. Massage therapy, which is based on several massage techniques, aims at relaxation and relaxation, while improving the recovery of our body's energy. Massage promotes better sleep, blood circulation, reduces stress, can undo tensions and relieve pain, helping to find our Health Balance.

service1.name: Swedish Massage
service1.description: Intramuscular massage that banishes tensions, relaxes and tones the body, helping to regain its natural balance.

service2.name: Therapeutic Massage
service2.description: A deep massage targeting muscle tension, helping to recover and regenerate the physiological functioning of affected areas.

service3.name: Athletic Massage
service3.description: Aims to release specific tensions and prepare the body for physical activity. Helps in prevention and rehabilitation of muscle injuries.

service4.name: Lymphatic Drainage
service4.description: Massage technique that stimulates lymphatic system and drains the toxins, while strengthening the immune system. Lymphatic drainage helps to accelerate scarring and reduces the risk of infections. It would also be useful to treat conditions such as varicose veins, cellulites and venous insufficiency (heavy legs).

service5.name: Prenatal Massage
service5.description: Prenatal Massage offers relaxation tailored to your stage of pregnancy. Massage therapists will address the tension, aches, and pains caused by pregnancy to give expecting moms the gift of wellness they deserveâ€”and need! This deep tissue massage calms the baby and dissipates stress, soothing sore muscles. It also improves lymphatic circulation to reduce swelling and discomfort. It is not recommended to start massage treatments prior 12 weeks of gestation, in order to diminish the risks for the fetus.

promo1.title: New Clients
promo1.description: All new clients receive 10$ OFF for their first visit

promo2.title: Refer a Friend
